name: Astoria Park Skatepark
description: Solid neighborhood skatepark under the Hell Gate Bridge in Astoria Park.
history: Added during park renovations. Serves the growing Astoria skate community.
transitDirections: N/W to Astoria Blvd, walk to Astoria Park.

detailedNotes.terrain: Features include ledges, rails, quarter pipes, manual pads. Well-maintained concrete construction.
detailedNotes.culture: Part of the Queens skate scene in Astoria. Added during park renovations. Serves the growing Astoria skate community.
detailedNotes.tips: Best approach: N/W to Astoria Blvd, walk to Astoria Park.. Afternoons year-round. Good local vibe.
detailedNotes.warnings: Public skatepark â€” standard park etiquette applies.
